rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C106661

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version Test Code Terminology

definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version test code.
name: QS-Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version Test Code Terminology
synonyms: QS-Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Have you wished you were dead or wished you could go to sleep and not wake up? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Wish to be Dead (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Have you wished you were dead or wished you could go to sleep and not wake up? (Past _ Months).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Wish to be Dead (Past X Months)

terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Description of Wish to be Dead

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Have you actually had any thoughts of killing yourself? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Have you actually had any thoughts of killing yourself? (Past _ Months).

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Description of non-specific active suicidal thoughts.

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Have you been thinking about how you might do this? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Have you been thinking about how you might do this? (Past _ Months).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act (Past X Months)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Description of active suicidal ideation with any methods (not plan) without intent to act.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Description of Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act
synonyms: CSS04-Idea, No Intent, No Plan, Describe

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Have you had these thoughts and had some intention of acting on them? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Have you had these thoughts and had some intention of acting on them? (Past _ Months).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan (Past X Months)

terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Description of Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Have you started to work out or worked out the details of how to kill yourself? Do you intend to carry out this plan? (Lifetime).

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Have you started to work out or worked out the details of how to kill yourself? Do you intend to carry out this plan? (Past _ Months).

terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Description of Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent

terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Describe Most Severe Ideation (Past X Months)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - How many times have you had these thoughts? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Frequency of Most Severe Ideation (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - How many times have you had these thoughts? (Past _ Months).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Frequency of Most Severe Ideation (Past X Months)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Could/can you stop thinking about killing yourself or wanting to die if you want to? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Controllability of Most Severe Ideation (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Could/can you stop thinking about killing yourself or wanting to die if you want to? (Past _ Months).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Controllability of Most Severe Ideation (Past X Months)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Are there things-anyone or anything (e.g., family, religion, pain of death) - that stopped you from wanting to die or acting on thoughts of committing suicide? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Deterrents to Most Severe Ideation (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Are there things-anyone or anything (e.g., family, religion, pain of death) - that stopped you from wanting to die or acting on thoughts of committing suicide? (Past _ Months).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Deterrents to Most Severe Ideation (Past X Months)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - What sort of reasons did you have for thinking about wanting to die or killing yourself? Was it to end the pain or stop the way you were feeling (in other words you couldn't go on living with this pain or how you were feeling) or was it to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others? Or both? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Reasons for Most Severe Ideation (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - What sort of reasons did you have for thinking about wanting to die or killing yourself? Was it to end the pain or stop the way you were feeling (in other words you couldn't go on living with this pain or how you were feeling) or was it to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others? Or both? (Past _ Months).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Reasons for Most Severe Ideation (Past X Months)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Have you made a suicide attempt? Have you done anything to harm yourself? Have you done anything dangerous where you could have died? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version - Actual Suicide Attempt (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Have you made a suicide attempt? Have you done anything to harm yourself? Have you done anything dangerous where you could have died? (Past _ Years).

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version - Has there been a time when you started to do something to try to end your life but someone or something stopped you before you actually did anything? (Lifetime).
